item.title: Generate your .ssh/config
item.description: On ubuntu 16.04 is still an old version of OpenSSH client that don’t support include statement’s on it’s .ssh/config. I manage my dotfiles in git repos and one such is .ssh/config.d. The script below is capable take that repo as source and generate the configuration.
